name: Deduplicate genes (gig-map)
description: Identify a non-redundant set of gene sequences based on pairwise alignment of amino acid sequences.

genes.help: Folder containing all genes to be analyzed. All files must be in amino acid FASTA format (gzip-compressed).

cluster_similarity.help: Amino acid similarity used for clustering (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0) [default: 0.9]

cluster_coverage.help: Alignment coverage coverage used for clustering (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0) [default: 0.9]

min_gene_length.help: Minimum amino acid length threshold used to filter genes [default: 50]

nxf_profile.help: Profile used for resource allocation (standard or testing)
